org.activebpel.rt.bpel.function
Interface IAeFunctionFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractBpelObject
public interface IAeFunctionFactory

This interface represents a factory that will create instances of IAeFunction from a given namespace and function name. Typically an implementation will contain multiple function contexts, each function context mapped to one or more namespaces. A call to getFunction will then look up the correct function context based on the namespace and then ask that context for the function. In addition, this interface can be used to enumerate all of the namespaces for which it has function contexts.

Method Summary
 IAeFunction getFunction(java.lang.String aNamespace, java.lang.String aFunctionName)
          Looks up a function given the namespace and function name.
 java.util.List getFunctionContextNamespaceList()
          Gets a list of all namespaces for which function contexts are configured.
 

Method Detail

getFunction

public IAeFunction getFunction(java.lang.String aNamespace,
                               java.lang.String aFunctionName)
                        throws AeUnresolvableException
Looks up a function given the namespace and function name. The impl should locate a function context that is configured for the given namespace and then ask that context for a function of the given name. Throws an unresolvable exception only if the context is found but there is no function in the context with the given name. If no context is found, then null is returned.

Parameters:
aNamespace -
aFunctionName -
Throws:
AeUnresolvableException - only if the context is found but there is no function in the context with the given name

getFunctionContextNamespaceList

public java.util.List getFunctionContextNamespaceList()
Gets a list of all namespaces for which function contexts are configured. A list of Strings is returns (each namespace is a String in the List).
